meanings.definition: An Italian appetizer consisting of a small slice of toasted bread topped with various ingredients.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious crostino with cheese and tomatoes at the party.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a variety of crostini with different toppings.
meanings.sent3: The crostino was so small, it looked like a tiny edible plate!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity in making crostini was like turning a simple bread slice into a flavorful canvas.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked crostino filled the room, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: A small piece of toasted bread used as a base for appetizers or toppings.
meanings.sent1: She placed a crostino under the shrimp cocktail for an elegant presentation.
meanings.sent2: The crostini were arranged neatly on the platter for the guests to enjoy.
meanings.sent3: The crostino was so crunchy, it could double as a mini cracker!
meanings.sent4: Using a crostino as a base was like building a tasty tower of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The golden-brown crostino added a delightful crunch to the dish.
